name: todoly
description: Simple full-stack app for getting all your to-dos under control.

scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.start:dev: concurrently 'nodemon --config nodemon.json' 'cd client && npm run start'
scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && npm i && cd client && npm i && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.test: npm run -s test:client && npm run -s test:server
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test

author: Brandon Burrus
